languages.text: "Кредо должно твердо соблюдаться на борту. Раз пустотники не крепки в вере, пусть фактотум найдет истового служителя Экклезиархии за пределами корабля".
"The Creed must be strictly observed aboard the vessel. Since the voidsmen are wavering in their faith, let the High Factotum find a true servant of the Ecclesiarchy elsewhere."
languages.original_text: "Кредо должно твердо соблюдаться на борту. Раз пустотники не крепки в вере, пусть фактотум найдет истового служителя Экклезиархии за пределами корабля".

traits.locale_text: "The Creed must be strictly observed aboard the vessel. And if the voidsmen are wavering in their faith, let the Factotum find a true servant of the Ecclesiarchy elsewhere."

languages.text: "Der Glaube muss an Bord des Schiffes strikt eingehalten werden. Da die Raumfahrer in ihrem Glauben schwanken, soll das Hoch-Faktotum woanders einen wahren Diener der Ekklesiarchie suchen."
languages.original_text: "The Creed must be strictly observed aboard the vessel. Since the voidsmen are wavering in their faith, let the High Factotum find a true servant of the Ecclesiarchy elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Der Glaube muss an Bord des Schiffes strikt eingehalten werden. Da die Raumfahrer in ihrem Glauben schwanken, soll das Hoch-Faktotum woanders einen wahren Diener der Ekklesiarchie suchen."

languages.text: «El Credo debe acatarse estrictamente a bordo de la nave. Como los viajeros del vacío flaquean en su fe, se encomendará al Sumo Factótum que busque un verdadero siervo de la Eclesiarquía en alguna otra parte».
languages.original_text: "The Creed must be strictly observed aboard the vessel. Since the voidsmen are wavering in their faith, let the High Factotum find a true servant of the Ecclesiarchy elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: «El Credo debe acatarse estrictamente a bordo de la nave. Como los viajeros del vacío flaquean en su fe, se encomendará al Sumo Factótum que busque un verdadero siervo de la Eclesiarquía en alguna otra parte».

languages.text: 「船内では信条を厳守する。ヴォイズマンたちの信仰が揺らいでいるのなら、ハイ・ファクトタムに帝国聖教会の真の従者をどこかで見つけさせよう」
languages.original_text: "The Creed must be strictly observed aboard the vessel. Since the voidsmen are wavering in their faith, let the High Factotum find a true servant of the Ecclesiarchy elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: 「船内では信条を厳守する。ヴォイズマンたちの信仰が揺らいでいるのなら、ハイ・ファクトタムに帝国聖教会の真の従者をどこかで見つけさせよう」

languages.text: “帝国的信条必须严格遵守。既然那些船员在信仰方面摇摆不定，那就让高阶顾问去别的地方寻找国教真正的忠仆吧。”
languages.original_text: "The Creed must be strictly observed aboard the vessel. Since the voidsmen are wavering in their faith, let the High Factotum find a true servant of the Ecclesiarchy elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: “帝国的信条必须严格遵守。既然那些船员在信仰方面摇摆不定，那就让高阶顾问去别的地方寻找国教真正的忠仆吧。”

languages.text: « Le Credo doit être scrupuleusement observé à bord du vaisseau. Puisque la foi des cosmomarins est vacillante, que le haut factotum se charge de recruter ailleurs un véritable serviteur de l'Ecclésiarchie. »
languages.original_text: "The Creed must be strictly observed aboard the vessel. Since the voidsmen are wavering in their faith, let the High Factotum find a true servant of the Ecclesiarchy elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: « Le Credo doit être scrupuleusement observé à bord du vaisseau. Puisque la foi des cosmomarins est vacillante, que le haut factotum se charge de recruter ailleurs un véritable serviteur de l'Ecclésiarchie. »

languages.text: "İtikat geminin dört bir yanında katı bir şekilde gözlemlenmeli. Uçsuz erlerinin inancı sarsıldığı için Arşıkâhya gerçek bir Ekleşiarşi hizmetkârını başka bir yerden temin etmeli."
languages.original_text: "The Creed must be strictly observed aboard the vessel. Since the voidsmen are wavering in their faith, let the High Factotum find a true servant of the Ecclesiarchy elsewhere."
